gif.alt: A video showing how to use the arithmetic operator block Trinket

arithmetic-step-1.step_text: The arithmetic operator block can be found under the "numbers" menu. It consists of two blank slots for numbers or variables and a dropdown to select the operator.

arithmetic-step-2.step_text: Fill in the slots with variables, numbers, or more arithmetic operation blocks.
arithmetic-step-2.alt: Shows a filled-in arithmetic operator block.

arithmetic-step-3.step_text: Choose the arithmetic operation you want to use.
arithmetic-step-3.alt: Shows the dropdown menu for arithmetic operators

arithmetic-step-4.step_text: The operation will be simplified for printing or storing to a variable.
arithmetic-step-4.alt: Shows a printout of the 4 operations
